caption: Bad credentials
message: The combination you provided did not match with any user

caption: E-mail already registered
message: The e-mail address you provided is already registered in the database

caption: Username already exists
message: The username you requested is already in use, please try another one

caption: E-mail address not found
message: The e-mail address you provided was not found in the database

caption: Invalid token
message: The token you entered is invalid.

caption: Token required
message: This operation requires you to pass in a valid token

caption: Token expired
message: The token you provided was expired. Please enter a valid one
